name: Todich Floral Design
overview:
Todich Floral Design is an award winning wedding an events florist based in south London.

The online company has a highly skilled and creative team of florists who are passionate about flowers, with years of experience in practical floristry; Todich Floral Design provides a bespoke flower service throughout all of London and the south east of England.

From the simplest of bouquets to large event floral displays, their creative approach, quality and careful attention to detail are evident in everything they do. Wedding bouquets, corsages, buttonholes, pedestal arrangements, pew ends, prop hire service, table centres and top table displays are just a few of the displays they have to offer.

The company guarantee the highest quality flowers as they are sourced from local suppliers through a strict selection process. Todich Floral Design have recently renovated their websites gallery and budget planner application with new up to date professional photos.

milestones.description: Best Business for Customer Service 2011 - The Lambeth Business Awards, in association with MJF
